name: Neko Night
description:
Story

Working as a freelance writer is best when you can share with the world something you've seen first-hand, like a true reporter. However, your latest assignment is nothing like that. You've been tasked to write about dating advice... but how can you write about something that you've never experienced?

Right as you're about to smash your head into the wall from writer's block, there is a knock at your door! Who could it be?

Standing at your doorstep, drenched from the rain, is a young, beautiful... catgirl?! She seems to know you, yet you have no recollection of her. She claims to be on a divine mission - to be your girlfriend! But she's not the only unexpected guest. A second catgirl shows up soon after with the same higher calling...

This must be a dream, right?

Features

  • A new kind of visual novel with ASMR scenes, best enjoyed through your headphones!
  • A fun linear story with kawaii catgirls
  • Fully voiced in Japanese
